title: [HOLD for payment 2024-08-14] [$250] Tax-In tax name field, saving with code does not throw error
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Pre-condition:Have a workspace with tax enabled
1. Go to expensify site in both mweb and android app
2. Tap profile icon -- workspaces-- workspace
3. Tap tax -- Add tax rate -- Name
4.Paste <h> and save it

Expected result: In tax name field, saving with code must throw error " invalid character " across site consistently in same way.

Actual result: None
